comments: Pretty difficult class. I struggled with a lot of the material. Finally went to her office hours and she really made an attempt to help me understand some of the material.

i had huang last semester, and it was definitely difficult to understand her lectures due to her heaving accent. however, she does curve your grade generously at the end. i missed one out of the three exams (worth a great deal of points) and didn\'t do so well on the online quizzes and tests, yet surprisingly, i still manage to pass the class.

Ke huang is undoubtedly intelligent, but she lacks passion to teach her students. She lacks the undying need to help her students succeed. My only word of advice is to run...seriously! She\'s very difficult to understand, and honestly makes her students feel dumb for asking qustions.

She is very hard to understand. She is probably very smart but just simply cannot relay the material to her students in a way they can understand or let alone comprehend. Her tests are hard and not anything like what she tells you will be on the test. Would not take her if you get easily frustrated because she is not very willing to help explain.

I cannot understand a word this professor says, and when you ask a question she gets very frustrated when she is unable to communicate what she means. Practice for test is a lot easier than actual test. Somehow managed to get an A. She seems like a smart woman, but her inability to speak English well creates many problems.

I truly believe if her English skills were good enough she\'d be a better teacher, but unfortunately half the time her words are not coming out clear enough for you to hear. So basically, if you\'re bad at math and you need teacher assistance she would not be the teacher to take.
taking business stat now, will definitely update ASAP. so far, she is hard to understand and handwriting is hard to comprehend
